TopicTitle: Group playing KSP helping each other using VOIP? (This thread may need moving sorry)

Articles.Content:
Hi, (I hope this is the right place to post this. Sorry if it needs to be moved)

After playing KSP for about a week now i love it and find it a great challenge but like most single player games i start to get lonely and crave some human interaction.

Im looking for people that like to play KSP career mode while having a chat helping each other out using any VOIP software IE;Skype, TS3, Ventrilo.... You get the idea.

If there are any kerbalnauts out there that fancy trying to make contact with distant Kerbalites out in the vast nothingness of space then lets bring our comm's together and explore together.

Skype: James_Trendall
hey, I'd love to do a ts3 thing, if only someone had a server or something...
I'm not sure if this is still up and working or not, but.. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/21641-Community-Voice-Server-In-space-WE-can-hear-you-scream!
If you feel lonely you could also try starting/watching livestreams on twitch. Lots of nice, helpful people there, in chat as well as on stream.

I'm not sure if this is still up and working or not, but.. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/21641-Community-Voice-Server-In-space-WE-can-hear-you-scream!

Thank you loads i just checked that link and it's still running. There are 4 people in there currently.

The TS should be used more or be added as a sticky somewhere for us all to jump in and share are experiences together.
